thread.title: Police: Missing Mesa woman found dead near Globe
thread.title_full: Police: Missing Mesa woman found dead near Globe

author: The Republic | azcentral.com
title: Police: Missing Mesa woman found dead near Globe
text:
Cari Fort (Photo: Mesa Police Department) 
239 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE A 32-year-old Mesa woman reported missing by concerned family members has been found dead, police say.
Police had appealed to the public for help to find Cari Fort, 32, early Monday. She was said to have sent her husband a concerning text message Sunday afternoon that left him believing she intended to harm herself.
Her vehicle was found parked off U.S. 60 near Globe on Monday morning and her body was found nearby, officials said.
Foul play is not suspected, according to Detective Steve Berry, a Mesa police spokesman.
Police said Fort had a history of depression and suicidal thoughts.
